EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: Webinar Today on Inflight Internet Connectivity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming BendixKing Webinar, “Inflight Internet Connectivity with BendixKing AeroWave 100.”
Date: May 28 th, 2020 Start Time: 8 p.m. EDT Duration: 30 Minutes + 10 Minute for Q&A
{{my.My Token:default=Add to Calendar}}
Please access the webcast link <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/96669247672?pwd=dlQzay84UWUrSGlIeENLVWE3bm5Vdz09]]> 5 minutes before the webinar begins.
The webinar will be given by BendixKing’s Sapan Shah, Sr. Product Manager who has years of experience in connectivity and communication.
Thank you and enjoy the webcast!
The BendixKing team
